about_the_game:
🎅 Logic Town - Santa's Grotto DLC 🎄

Step into the festive spirit with "Santa's Grotto," the heartwarming first DLC for Logic Town! In this chapter, you'll embark on a journey to build and decorate a special Christmas grotto in the Grand Hotel, ensuring everything is perfect for Santa's upcoming visit.

🎁 New Chapter: Immerse yourself in an extra-long chapter of Logic Town, made up of 35 carefully crafted story puzzles, Collaborate with Agnes to bring Santa's Grotto to life.

🧩 Three new puzzle themes that remix existing icons with 5 brand new categories:

  • The Toy Workshop Help Santa's busy elves as they craft and assemble toys for children around the town.
  • The Festive Market Step into the lively hustle and bustle of Logic Town's enchanting Festive Market, where the aroma of freshly baked biscuits mingles with the joyous laughter of townsfolk.
  • The Night Before Christmas Join the boys and girls of the town as they eagerly prepare for Santa's visit, decorating their rooms with festive garlands and decorations, and trying their best to stay awake to catch a glimpse of the jolly old man in red.

🏆 Gear up for a spirited holiday challenge and take to the leaderboards with the new Christmas Free Play Puzzle Theme!
